attributes.action: End the secrecy over MPs' financial interests
attributes.background:
Current regulations make it too easy for MPs to hide their financial
interests. 40% of company directorships held by politicians have not
been formally declared. Change parliamentary rules so the public can
hold MPs to account and prevent corruption.

Details: http://bit.ly/2e7IbfO

rejection.details:
You could start a petition calling for a specific change to the rules about the registration and declaration of MP's financial interests. 

You can find the existing Code of Conduct here:

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201516/cmcode/1076/1076.pdf
